title: Triad Princess
overview: Triad Princess tells the story of sweet but fierce Angie, who, after growing up under the shadow of her mafia-affiliated father, defies his wishes and takes on a gig as a bodyguard of a famous actress Ling-Yun in an elaborate plan to get closer to her love interest, superstar Xu Yi Hang, despite the rumours of Ling and Xu's romantic coupling.
